metadata.title: CVE-2019-14732 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
AdPlug 2.3.1 has multiple heap-based buffer overflows in Ca2mLoader::load()in a2m.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14732` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

adplug-utils - 2.3.3+dfsg-2
libadplug-2.3.3-0 - 2.3.3+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: adplug package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.3+dfsg-2').
